name: Firefox 4 - Allow tabs to shrink to icons
description:
Set the minimum tab width to the same as app tabs but specify a higher minimum width for the active tab to make room for the close button.

Gives Chrome-like tab-sizing behaviour until the tabs eventually become so numerous that scrolling is the only option.
